channel.title: Client.java editing, gui.java problems
channel.description:
so i have been trying for a hour now, ive changed all of them etc and nothing has worked it just says error connecting, rune locus says my server is up which is all good but i really want to start getting people to join
Client.java
http://pastebin.com/73fL9dDq
Gui.java
http://pastebin.com/3C3jmBRR
Can you tell me which ones i need to change because im at a lost right nao.. thanks. :mad:

item.title: Client.java editing, gui.java problems
item.dc:creator: @Delta1wolf Delta1wolf
item.description:
@Delta1wolf wrote:

JavaTC:

Change the ip of the client to your server’s ip and then compile it.

ive changed ALL the ones in client.java and i got error… do i need to change all the ones in gui.java too?

Read full topic
